name: Digicons
description:
This is a game based on PC vs Consoles debates that take place all over the internet by fanboys. However, the game takes place in fantasy terms. Console side is what you are going to take in this game and have to stop the evil PC elitists from destroying the Consoles. It's time to show the world who brag about PCs being superior to Consoles that they are wrong.

Features-

-14 different Consoles including their evolution to play with.

-Featured about 23 enemy PCs including bosses and mini bosses.

-4 beautiful levels to clear.

-A great story line to follow.
